alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boca Pointe, or near Deerfield Beach, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Coconut Creek, North Lauderdale, Parkland, Mission Bay, Boca Pointe, Godfrey Road, Boca Del Mar, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Whisper Walk, Loxahatchee NWR, Hillsboro Ranches, North Pompano Beach and Boca West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
